mapper.select:
select id, hosp_code, admdvs_code admdvsCode, admdvs_name admdvsName from center_insure_admdvs where hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and (admdvs_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or admdvs_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
select admdvs_code admdvsCode, admdvs_name admdvsName from center_insure_admdvs where hosp_code = #{hospCode}
